Text.Page:
*Grumble* Oh, great! Another foul-smelling creature coming to harass me. I honestly have no idea why my sister finds your kind so irresistibly delicious.

Anyhow, am I to assume that you want to dump your Tokens: Fire Demon's Strength on me? Probably in exchange for one of my precious treasures, no doubt?

Then be quick about it at least and let me breathe some fresh air again!
